Boeing.tweettext: Boeing is building a brand new 747 Air Force One for future presidents,but costs are out of control, more than $4 billion. Cancel order!

Nordstrom.tweettext: My daughter Ivanka has been treated so unfairly by @Nordstrom. She is a great person -- always pushing me to do the right thing! Terrible!
